        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getTimes

        public static int getTimes​(float lat,
                           float log)
        Calculate the local time given GMT time and corresponded query url.
        Parameters:
        lat - The latitute of the airport
        log - The longitute of the airport
        Returns:
        offset to the GMT time (in seconds)

      • offCall

        public static int offCall​(java.lang.String xmlTimezone)
                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Get the GMTOffset from the XML file.
        Parameters:
        xmlTimezone - The XML string get from API.
        Returns:
        offset of the timezone from GMT.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • verifyLeg

        public static boolean verifyLeg​(java.util.Date arrD,
                                java.util.Date deparD)
        Verify the leg is effective
        Parameters:
        arrD - the pre-flight arrive time
        deparD - the post-flight departure time
        Returns:
        If it is effective return true, else return false
